solution_line_template: In {years_in_future} years, Cori will be {cori_current_age} + {years_in_future} = <<{cori_current_age}+{years_in_future}={cori_future_age}>>{cori_future_age} years old.
In 5 years, Cori’s aunt will be {cori_future_age} x {aunt_age_multiplier} = <<{cori_future_age}*{aunt_age_multiplier}={aunt_future_age}>>{aunt_future_age} years old.
Today, her aunt is {aunt_future_age} - {years_in_future} = <<{aunt_future_age}-{years_in_future}={aunt_current_age}>>{aunt_current_age} years old.
